title: Gain insights on trends in SaaS space at Techcircle SaaS Forum 2015; register now
text:
Home > Announcement > Gain insights on trends in SaaS space at Techcircle SaaS Forum 2015; register now Gain insights on trends in SaaS space at Techcircle SaaS Forum 2015; register now | 0 Comments 
Techcircle SaaS Forum 2015 is all set to throw up attractive trends and success stories which have taken business practices to an altogether new level. This coupled with the impressive array of panellists and speakers who are participating in this forum, provides a captivating platform for budding tech geeks and SaaS stakeholders to gain insights on how to navigate their way to a successful business proposition. 
The forum will see participation from leading SaaS professionals, top and emerging SaaS companies, innovators, early stage SaaS startups, angel & venture capital investors and potential partners who will deliberate on the best practices and the factors favouring SaaS businesses in India. 
Bhanu Chopra, CEO, RateGain, will talk about the essentials of building a successful & world class SaaS company. Aneesh Reddy, CEO of Capillary Technologies, will also share thoughts on the emerging opportunities in the SaaS business. 
To get an investor perspective on how to pitch a SaaS startup and get a heads-up on trends and challenges, the event will feature an investor talk by Ravi Gururaj, Chairman & Co-Founder of Frictionless Ventures. 
Highlights of the summit are: Why is the time right to invest in SaaS businesses in India? Which markets to go for: Global v/s local; enterprise v/s SMEs? Growing opportunities in India centric SaaS Businesses: Are SMEs fostering SaaS transformation in India? Early SaaS adopters v/s back benchers â€“ Emerging sectors embracing SaaS services. Is the time right to look at mobile first SaaS solutions? Are smartphones driving consumerisation & personalisation of SaaS services? 
To look at the detailed programme and agenda click here 
Since Techcircle SaaS Forum will be focusing on startups and growth of entrepreneurs, the forum will also consist of Techcircle showcase session which will be powered by NASSCOM 10,000 Startups. This will be a curated platform featuring five innovative companies in the SaaS space who will come on the stage and make presentations on their path-breaking ideas, business models and niche opportunities. If you think you are one of these five companies, click here to nominate your company or write to kanika@vccircle.com. 
Send us your views, ideas and suggestions on Twitter; use our event hashtag: #TCSaaS15 
To book your seats now, register here or write to or write to Kanika at register@vccircle.com /0120-4171111. 
For branding and display opportunities, write to varun@vccircle.com
